thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com
thread.title: Frederick Shearer
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Frederick Shearer

author: Frederick Shearer
title: Frederick Shearer
text: We will never deal with any other company but Quicken Loans. The people we dealt with Bill Poirier and Terry Tori and their team explain everything so clearly to us and had great people skills. We trust your company 100 percent. Thank you for making this time for us so easy.
